describe: Namibia is a country in Southern Africa known for its stunning landscapes, including the Namib Desert, the world's oldest desert, and the Etosha National Park, a haven for wildlife. It is a land of diverse cultures and rich history, offering a unique blend of traditional and modern influences.

cities.name: 🌆 Windhoek
cities.climate: Semi-arid climate with hot summers and mild winters

cities.name: 🏝 Swakopmund
cities.geographical_location: On the coast of western Namibia
cities.climate: Desert climate with cool sea breezes

cities.name: 🏝 Walvis Bay
cities.geographical_location: On the coast of central Namibia
